Message01_01
むっ、お主は… なかなか出来るヤツのようじゃの
Oh, sieht so aus als wärst du...ein ziemlich kompetenter Typ, was.
Oh, seems like you're... a pretty capable fellow, huh.
Oh, on dirait que tu... te débrouilles bien, hein ?
Oh, sembra che tu... sia uno piuttosto in gamba.
Oh, parece que eres... un joven capaz, ¿eh?
Oh, seems like you're... a pretty capable fellow, huh.

Message01_02
なんでも最近 夜の江戸に大層大きなムカデが出るそうでの\n お主ならば もしや彼奴を打ち倒せるやもしれん…
Es gibt Berichte über riesige Tausendfüßler, die nachts in Edo ihr Unwesen treiben sollen.\nDu solltest es schaffen, sie auszuschalten...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
En ce moment, on dit qu'il y aurait des centipèdes géants qui sortiraient la nuit à Edo.\nTu pourrais peut-être arriver à les battre...
Si dice che durante la notte le strade di Edo siano infestate da millepiedi giganti.\nForse tu potresti essere in grado di eliminarne qualcuno...
Se han visto ciempiés gigantes, que salen durante la noche en Edo.\nTal vez puedas acabar con estos...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
There have been reports recently of gigantic centipedes that come out at night in Edo.\nYou might be able to take them down...
Message01_03
その大きなムカデを討つと その体内から石版が出てくるそうじゃ\n これをやるから 8種類全部揃えてみせい
Anscheinend kommt eine Tafel aus seinem Körper, wenn du einen riesigen Tausendfüßler besiegst.\nIch werde dir dies hier geben, wenn du alle acht Tafeln für mich beschaffst.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
Il paraît que si tu bats les centipèdes géants, une tablette sortira de leur corps.\nJe te donnerai ça si tu arrives à me trouver les 8 tablettes.
Sconfiggendo un millepiedi gigante, otterrai una tavoletta.\nSe recuperi tutti e 8 i tipi di tavolette per me, avrai come ricompensa questo oggetto.
Si derrotas a un ciempiés gigante, una losa saldrá de su cuerpo.\nTe daré esto si me consigues las ocho.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
If you defeat the gigantic centipedes, apparently a tablet comes out of their body.\nI'll give you this if you retrieve all 8 for me.
Message01_04
8種類全てを揃えたら… またワシのところに来い\n お主を真のもののふと認め 良いものをやろう…
Sammle alle acht... und komm wieder zu mir.\nIch werde dich als wahrer Krieger anerkennen und dir etwas Schönes geben...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
Quand tu auras toutes les 8... reviens me voir.\nJe te considérerai comme un(e) vrai(e) guerrier(e), et je te donnerai quelque chose de bien...
Quando le avrai tutte e 8... e torna di nuovo a trovarmi.\nAvrai come ricompensa un oggetto degno solo dei veri guerrieri...
Cuando consigas las ocho... ven a verme de nuevo.\nConseguirás que te reconozca como un gran guerrero, y te daré algo bueno...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
When you gather all 8... and come see me again.\nYou'll get my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you something good...
Message02_01
…なんじゃ？ さっさとムカデを倒してこぬか\n ワシに早く石版を見せてくれんかの
Was? Beeil dich und besiege die Tausendfüßler!\nIch möchte diese Tafeln wirklich gerne sehen.
What? Hurry up and go defeat the centipedes!\nI really want to see those tablets.
Quoi ? Dépêche-toi et va battre les centipèdes !\nJe veux vraiment voir ces tablettes.
Sbrigati, vai a sconfiggere i millepiedi!\nNon vedo l'ora di mettere le mani su quelle tavolette.
¿Qué? ¡Date prisa y derrota a los ciempiés!\nMe encantaría ver esas losas.
What? Hurry up and go defeat the centipedes!\nI really want to see those tablets.
What? Hurry up and go defeat the centipedes!\nI really want to see those tablets.
What? Hurry up and go defeat the centipedes!\nI really want to see those tablets.
What? Hurry up and go defeat the centipedes!\nI really want to see those tablets.

Message03_01
ほう… 石版を [NUM]個 手に入れたか なかなかやりおる…\n この調子で 8種類全部揃えてみせい
Oh... Du hast schon [NUM] Tafeln? Nicht schlecht...\nWenn du so weiter machst, hast du schnell alle acht beisammen.
Oh...you managed to get [NUM] tablets huh? Not bad...\nAt this rate you'll gather all 8 pieces in no time.
Oh....Tu as réussi à obtenir [NUM] tablettes, hein ? Pas mal...\nÀ ce rythme, tu trouveras les 8 en un rien de temps.
Oh... Vedo che hai [NUM] tavolette! Niente male...\nContinua così e vedrai che riuscirai ad averle tutte e 8 in un batter d'occhio.
Oh... has conseguido [NUM] losas, ¿no? No está mal...\nA ese ritmo, no tardarás en reunir las ocho.
Oh...you managed to get [NUM] tablets huh? Not bad...\nAt this rate you'll gather all 8 pieces in no time.

Message04_01
ほう… ついに石版を8個全て手に入れたか\n やはり ワシの目に狂いはなかったようじゃ
Wow...du hast schon alle acht Tafeln?\nIch wusste, es war gut, dich zu schicken.
Wow... you already got all 8 tablets?\nYep, I knew I was right to send you.
Eh bien... tu as déjà réuni les 8 tablettes ?\nJe savais que j'avais bien fait de te choisir.
Hehe... hai tutte e 8 le tavolette, eh?\nSapevo di non sbagliarmi sul tuo conto.
Uau... ¿ya has conseguido las ocho?\nSí, sabía hacía bien mandándote a ti.
Wow... you already got all 8 tablets?\nYep, I knew I was right to send you.
Wow... you already got all 8 tablets?\nYep, I knew I was right to send you.

Message04_02
お主を真のもののふと認め 「妖刀・百足丸」をくれてやろう\n 切れ味は折り紙付きじゃ お主ならきっと使いこなせるじゃろう…
Ich erkenne dich als wahrer Krieger an und gebe dir das Dämonenschwert, Mukademaru,\ngarantiert scharf. Ich bin mir sicher, dass du es beherrschen kannst.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
Je te considère comme un(e) vrai(e) guerrier(e) ! Voilà donc l'épée démoniaque, Mukademaru,\naiguisée comme il faut. Je suis sûr que tu pourras la maîtriser.
Tu sì che sei un vero guerriero... Questa è la Spada demoniaca, Mukademaru.\nNulla è in grado di resistere ai suoi fendenti. Sono certo che riuscirai a padroneggiarla.
Tienes mi reconocimiento de que eres un guerrero de verdad, y te entrego la espada demoníaca, Mukademaru,\nque se mantiene siempre afilada. Estoy seguro de que conseguirás dominarla.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
You have my approval as a true warrior, and I'll give you the Demon Sword, Mukademaru,\nguaranteed sharp. I'm sure you can master it.
Message05_01
むっ、お主か… 「妖刀・百足丸」は使っておるかの？\n まだまだモノノケどもは湧いてきおる 精進せいよ
Oh, hey du... du besitzt das Dämonenschwert, Mukademaru?\nEs kommen immer wieder neue Monster. Kämpfe weiter.
Oh, hey you… you using the Demon Sword, Mukademaru?\nThe mononoke just keep coming. Keep up the fight.
Oh, toi… tu utilises l'épée démoniaque, Mukademaru ?\nLes monstres continuent de venir. Continue à combattre.
Ehi... stai usando la Spada demoniaca, Mukademaru?\nGli spiriti maligni continuano ad arrivare, continua a combattere.
Oh, ¡eh, tú! ¿Estás usando la espada demoníaca, Mukademaru?\nLos monstruos no dejan de aparecer. Sigue luchando.
Oh, hey you… you using the Demon Sword, Mukademaru?\nThe mononoke just keep coming. Keep up the fight.

Message06_01
モノノケ退治か…\n ワシも若いころには 暴れたもんじゃ
Die Monster ausrotten sagst du...?\nSie haben uns schon Probleme bereitet, als ich noch jung war.
Exterminating the mononoke, huh...?\nWe had a lot of trouble with them when I was young too
Exterminer les monstres, hein... ?\nOn avait aussi beaucoup de problèmes avec eux, quand j'étais jeune.
Ah, eliminare i mostri... quanti ricordi.\nAnche quando ero giovane io ci hanno creato qualche problema.
Acabando con los monstruos, ¿eh?\nRecuerdo que también nos causaron muchos problemas en mi juventud.
Exterminating the mononoke, huh...?\nWe had a lot of trouble with them when I was young too

Message06_02
ほれ そこにおる婆さんとて 昔はワシに夢中じゃったんじゃぞ\n それが今となっては…
Oh, sogar die alte Dame dort drüben war mir damals verfallen,\naber jetzt...
Oh, even that old lady over there was into me back in the day,\nbut now...
Et même cette vieille femme là-bas avait le béguin pour moi à l'époque,\nmais maintenant...
Hehe, e tutte le ragazze, anche quella vecchia signora laggiù, erano pazze di me a quei tempi!\nAdesso invece non mi si fila più nessuno.....
Oh, incluso esa anciana de allí andaba detrás de mí en aquella época,\npero ahora...
Oh, even that old lady over there was into me back in the day,\nbut now...
